Toyin Adegbola nke a maara nke ọma dị kà Toyin Asewo to re mecca (amụrụ na 28 Disemba n'afọ 1961) bụ nwanyi bụ nwa afọ Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi.
Toyin malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'afo 1984 na ihe nkiri asụsụ Yoruba nke Nollywood Ọ bụ onye otu bọọdụ nke Osun State Arts na Culture Council. Ọ bụ ihu a ma ama na ngalaba Nollywood.
Adegbola lụrụ onye nta akụkọ Maazị Anthony Kolawole Adegbola onye mechara nwụọ
Ọ zutere di ya nwụrụ anwụ mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Ụlọ Onyonyo Ibadan
N'oge ahụ, Maazị Adegbola na-arụ ọrụ na NTA Lagos.  Adegbola nwere ụmụ abụọ, nwa nwanyị, na nwa nwoke; ha abụọ bi na Dublin, Ireland
O nwekwara ụmụ ụmụ abụọ. Na Satọdee, 5 Machị n'afọ 2016, Eze Ukwu Alayeluwa Oba Isaac Adetoyi Adetuluese Olokose 11 nyere ya utu aha onye isi dị ka Yeye Meso nke Oke-Irun, Steeti Osun.
Ihe Onyinyé maka Professional Excellence  site na Symbol of Hope Foundation site na arụmọrụ ya na Asewo To Re Mecca
